publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Isaiah 64
ab.l: Čyḥqanda otnu ullu jalyny otnun suvnu qajnatyr ot bildirḿa šemijni tar b́eŕuv́č́uĺarija alnyjdan ḥanlyḥlar tit́ŕagejĺar.
Qylɣanyjda qorḥunčluluḥlar isanmagejidik ėńdirdij alnyjdan tavlar ėridiĺarmo.
Da avaldan ėšit́- ḿadiĺar qulaḥ salmadylar ḱoź ḱorḿadi T́eńrini bašḥa ki bolej qylgej t́oźuv́č́uǵa anar.

Qarat́et́tij Mošeni bijańuv́č́uńu saruvlaryja da Aharonnu qyluvčunu rastlyḥlarny alar juŕujdoɣoč jollaryj byla śeniń saɣynyŕediĺar śeni muna jazyḥly bolduḥ da śeń ačuvlandyj alarnyn źeḫutlaryna išanyredik avaldan da jarlyɣašlanyredik.

Da bolduḥ murdar kibik barymyz da upranɣan upraḥ kibik bar źeḫutlarymyz da uprandyḥ
japraḥ kibik barymyz da jazyḥlarymyz jeĺ kibik ėĺt́tiĺar biźni.
Da joḥtur čaɣyruvču šemija ojanuvčunu kip tutunma śeńd́ań ki jašyrdyj qyblalaryjny biźd́ań da čyɣara b́erdij biźni ėrkińa ǵuńaḥ- ĺarimiźniń.
Da halegińa H atamyz śeń biź ol balčyḥ da śeń jaratuv- čumuz da jaratmaɣy qudratlaryjnyn barymyz.
Ačuvlanmaɣyn ėj YWY oɣuta astry da dunjaɣa d́ejiń saɣynmaɣyn jazyḥny muna baḥqyn ėńdi ulusuj barymyz.
Aziź šaḥarlaryj boldular midbar ki- bik boldu šahary Jerušalajimniń adaɣan.
Aziź juv́uḿuź da ḱord́u- ḿuź qajsyn ki maḥtadylar atalarymyz boldu ḱuv́d́urḿagińa ot- nun da bar suqlančy ńerśaĺarimiź boldu v́eŕańlikḱa.
Bular üč́uńmo čydarsyn ėj H tyjylyrsyn da qyjnarmusun biźni oɣuta astry.
